meanings.definition: A main division of a book, typically with a number or title.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the first chapter introduces the main characters.
meanings.sent2: I can't wait to read the next chapter of this exciting novel.
meanings.sent3: The chapter about talking animals made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her life took a new turn, like a chapter in a thrilling mystery.
meanings.sent5: The chapter on space exploration was so fascinating.

meanings.definition: A local branch of a society.
meanings.sent1: The environmental chapter organized a beach cleanup.
meanings.sent2: I attended a meeting at the local chapter of the charity.
meanings.sent3: The chapter picnic was a fun way to connect with neighbors.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a vital chapter in the community's story.
meanings.sent5: The chapter members worked together to help those in need.

meanings.definition: A period of time or an episode in a person's life or in history.
meanings.sent1: His childhood was a happy chapter filled with adventures.
meanings.sent2: The chapter of the war brought significant changes to the country.
meanings.sent3: Getting lost in the city was an unexpected chapter in her day.
meanings.sent4: The chapter of love unfolded like a beautiful poem.
meanings.sent5: Each chapter of history teaches us valuable lessons.
